snippet: As the Nets prepare to meet with their star point guard Deron Williams, the franchise agreed to acquire Joe Johnson, a six-time All-Star, from the Atlanta Hawks.
abstract: Brooklyn Nets secure a trade with the Atlanta Hawks for six-time All-Star swingman Joe Johnson; are still scrambling to re-sign star point guard Deron Williams.
lead_paragraph: As the Nets prepare to meet with their star point guard Deron Williams, the franchise agreed to acquire Joe Johnson, a six-time All-Star, from the Atlanta Hawks.

headline.seo: With Eye on Williams, Nets Agree to Acquire Joe Johnson
headline.main: With Eye on Williams, Nets to Acquire Johnson
headline.print_headline: With Eye on Williams, Nets to Acquire Johnson
